text: kya tumane nahin dekha ki allaah ne vash mein kar diya[1] hai tumhaare lie, jo kuchh aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai tatha poorn kar diya hai tumapar apana puraskaar, khula tatha chhupa? aur kuchh log vivaad karate hain allaah ke vishay[2] mein, bina kisee gyaan, bina kisee maargadarshan aur bina kisee divy (raushan) pustak ke
